messages.title: Stopping Boris’s Disastrous No-Deal Brexit
messages.content: Boris Johnson and his government are committed to doing everything they can to run down the clock and crash us out of the EU without a deal.

messages.title: We know that a General Election is imminent
messages.content: I believe now that we will be having a General Election at some point in the near future and I would welcome that, as we need a change of government to solve so many of the issues our country is facing under a Conservative government and break the Brexit deadlock.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposition to a no-deal Brexit and support for seizing control of the parliamentary agenda to prevent the UK crashing out of the EU without a deal. Advocating for a second referendum or remaining in the EU.
Promoting the development of solar and green energy in Southampton.
Pushing parliament to introduce legislation that would make homes warmer, reducing fuel bills and helping the environment.
Fighting Tory cuts to Southampton schools; opposing the removal of £475 per pupil by 2020 if Tories remain in power.

issues.brexitEurope: Opposition to a no-deal Brexit, advocating for control of parliamentary agenda to prevent a no-deal scenario, considering a second referendum or remaining in the EU.
issues.education: Fighting Tory cuts to Southampton schools; opposing the removal of £475 per pupil by 2020 if Tories remain in power.
issues.environment: Pushing for legislation to make homes warmer and more energy-efficient, thereby helping the environment.
issues.governance: Advocating for change of government to resolve current issues under Conservative governance.

housing.content: Pushing parliament to introduce legislation that would make homes warmer, reducing fuel bills and helping the environment.

images.caption: Alan Whitehead, an update from your MP.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet mentions Alan Whitehead has been serving as a strong voice for Southampton for over 20 years and highlights his achievements within the city.
